title: Old Judge Book - The Photographic Baseball Cards of Goodwin & Company (1886-1890)
author: Baseball Rarities

posts.post_title: Old Judge Book - The Photographic Baseball Cards of Goodwin & Company (1886-1890)
posts.post_content:
I have some brand new copies of The Photographic Baseball Cards of Goodwin & Company (1886-1890) by Jay Miller, Joe Gonsowski & Richard Masson available.

If you have any interest in 19th century baseball cards, then this is a must for your library. 

Beautiful hardcover book. Over 450 full color pages. Nearly all known Old Judge cards are pictured. Includes biographical information about each player (sample page shown). Also has tons of info on other Old Judge issues (N167, N173, etc.), how they were produced, the rarities within the set, advertising and uncut sheets, etc.

$40 delivered. Will be sent either through USPS or Fedex Ground.

PayPal or a check is fine.

I'll take one----Email sent
Ben
